Player History
Drafted in 6th round, 165th overall pick, by Houston in 2004...
Earned first career win on 8/29/2008...
Had first career hit on 5/23/2009, off Jon Leicester (STL)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/21/2012, off Brandon Beachy (FLA)...
Signed as a free agent by New York (A) on 2/7/2014 to a 3-year deal worth $6,000,000 per year...
Was selected to the 2015 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Won World Championship with New York (A) in 2016...
Traded from New York (A) to Cincinnati on 4/21/2018 (Going to CIN: P P. Humber. Going to NYA: P B. Still, 2B B. Wambsganss Jr.)...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Won World Championship with Cincinnati in 2020...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 2/13/2021 to a 1-year deal worth $8,240,000 per year...
Injured on 7/24/2022 with a Broken Cheekbone, out for 8 weeks...
